an3.136:1.1: “Uppada va, bhikkhave, tathagatanam anuppada va tathagatanam, thitava sa dhatu dhammatthitata dhammaniyamata.
an3.136:1.4: Abhisambujjhitva abhisametva acikkhati deseti pannapeti patthapeti vivarati vibhajati uttanikaroti:
an3.136:1.6: Uppada va, bhikkhave, tathagatanam anuppada va tathagatanam thitava sa dhatu dhammatthitata dhammaniyamata.
an3.136:1.9: Abhisambujjhitva abhisametva acikkhati deseti pannapeti patthapeti vivarati vibhajati uttanikaroti:
an3.136:1.11: Uppada va, bhikkhave, tathagatanam anuppada va tathagatanam thitava sa dhatu dhammatthitata dhammaniyamata.
an3.136:1.14: Abhisambujjhitva abhisametva acikkhati deseti pannapeti patthapeti vivarati vibhajati uttanikaroti:
